NAME: Buzzoid
DESC: 'A hideous bug like creature that smells of liquor and sewage.' + '\n'
DIALOG: It flaps its pathetic wings with great force!

NAME: Zappan
DESC: 'Ted isn\'t quite sure what to make of this round object that gargles at him.' + '\n'
DIALOG: It throws a dog-doo snow cone!
It rubs yellow snow in your eye!
